Skill.source: Item:8:Jaws of Agony, Supreme Spiked Shield

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030SHITTY THINGS TO CONFIG PROPERLY ^xC8C8C8^xD02090^7- elusive effect, inc elusive effect from claw, the varying effect from withering step and nightblade resets and effect of all these on dot multi via Perfect Agony - full life vs low life vs neither - helix # of hits - EHP from elusive - Focus uptime (especially taking into account player skill and timing)^7^7
^xFFFF77Levelling ^xC8C8C81-12 ^7 - mule^7 ^x70FF70Splitting Steel ^xC8C8C8^7with a Duelist start, link w^7ith ^x70FF70Onslaught^xC8C8C8 and ^xE05030Chance to Bleed ^7Early links ^x70FF70Splitting Steel - Onslaught - Chance to Poison^7 / ^xE05030Chance to Bleed^7
^xD02090^xADAA47^xB97123^x8888FF^xADAA47^xFFFF77Key Act 1 Vendor Gems^7^xE05030 ^7^x70FF70- Precision - Whirling Blades - Smoke Mine - Spectral Helix - Withering Step^7 ^xE05030- Steelskin^7 ^xC8C8C8 12-55 ^7- ^x70FF70Spectral Helix - Onslaught - Nightblade - Chance to Poison^7 (swaps to ^x7070FFAdded Chaos^7 after Normal Lab) - First lab = ^x7070FFNoxious Strikes^7
^xFFFF77Key Act 2 Vendor Gems ^7- ^xE05030^x70FF70Herald of Agony^7^7 (Before Poison-cap from tree) - ^xE05030Herald of Ash^7 (Before Auras) -^x70FF70 Faster Attacks - Blood Rage - Nightblade Support^7
^xFFFF77Key Act 3 Vendor Gems^7 - ^x7070FFAssassin's Mark^7 (Before Normal Lab. After Normal lab go ^x7070FFDespair^7) ^x70FF70- Plague Bearer - Grace^7 - ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7 (depends)
55+ - ^x70FF70Spectral Helix^xC8C8C8^7 poison nightblade setup fulltime now. ^x70FF70Vicious Projectiles/Void Manipulation^7 ^7are lowest priority supports - Second lab = ^x7070FFToxic Delivery^7
Obviously there are a billion other things to look for depending on early wisdom/transmute and socket availability. Auras I probably go Grace + Purity of Elements for levelling. War Banner insane if you get it. Definitely buy after A6 if you have sockets. Steelskin until maps. Smoke mine or frostblink for movement skill of choice early. Pair with attack based movement skill most fitting (shield charge/blink arrow)

Input.name: customMods
Input.string: 25% less damage - enemy is not always low life - elusive effect goes up and down - helix hits usually between 2-3 projectiles - max helix hit is actually 6x with current projectile speed, but only on gruthkul+ sized bosses - focus uptime
